SELECT c.court_address ,CONCAT(cb.booking_date,cb.booking_start_time, cb.booking_end_time) as bookingDate , c.court_name ,gj.guest_info ,gj.guest_level ,gj.guest_position ,gj.guest_gender ,gj.guest_to ,gj.guest_fee FROM guest_join gj join court_booking cb on gj.court_booking_idx = cb.court_booking_idx join court c on cb.court_idx = c.court_idx where gj.guest_idx = #{param1};

SELECT gj.guest_idx ,c.court_name ,c.court_address ,t.team_name ,gj.guest_gender ,gj.guest_position ,gj.guest_level ,gj.guest_to FROM guest_join gj JOIN court_booking cb ON gj.court_booking_idx = cb.court_booking_idx JOIN court c ON c.court_idx = cb.court_idx JOIN team t ON t.team_idx = gj.team_idx WHERE gj.guest_state = 'true'

SELECT file_name FROM court_image ci JOIN court c ON ci.court_idx = c.court_idx JOIN court_booking cb ON cb.court_idx = ci.court_idx JOIN guest_join gj ON cb.court_booking_idx = gj.court_booking_idx WHERE gj.guest_idx = #{param1}

SELECT CONCAT(cb.booking_date, '/', cb.booking_start_time, '~', cb.booking_end_time) AS bookingDate ,gj.guest_idx ,c.court_name ,c.court_address ,t.team_name ,gj.guest_gender ,gj.guest_position ,gj.guest_level ,gj.guest_to ,gj.guest_info ,gj.guest_fee FROM guest_join gj join court_booking cb on gj.court_booking_idx = cb.court_booking_idx join court c on c.court_idx = cb.court_idx join team t on t.team_idx = gj.team_idx WHERE gj.guest_state = 'true' and gj.guest_idx = #{param1}
